name: Create new Google Sheets rows from Zoho Invoices
description: Every time a new Zoho Invoice item is created, Make will automatically add a new row to Google Sheets. This example uses the spreadsheet in [this link](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1yuAuPrWiyK9uA7U17pt36-6D9SmBw6PkvPOLvOeCk94/edit#gid=0).
